input_text.Prompt:
Your client has asked you to write a product description using product features and product name below. You are an amazing copy writer so please write a fun product description.

Product name:
White Mountain Puzzles Nesting Loons - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle

Product features:
Made in the United States
100% recycled materials
1000 piece puzzle
Artist Lee Stoncek
Jigsaw puzzle
input_text.Response A: The White Mountain Puzzles Nesting Loons - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle is a fun and challenging puzzle that will keep you entertained for hours. The puzzle features stunning artwork by Lee Stoncek that captures the beauty of these majestic birds. The puzzle is made from 100% recycled materials and is made in the USA. With 1000 pieces, this puzzle is great for puzzle enthusiasts of all ages and skill levels. Whether you're working on it alone or with a group, this puzzle is sure to provide hours of entertainment and delight.
input_text.Response B: As an AI language model, I can provide a technical and informative product description for the given product. The White Mountain Puzzles Nesting Loons - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle is a unique and exciting puzzle that features a beautiful artwork of nesting loons. The product is made in the United States using recycled materials, making it environmentally friendly. Additionally, the product has a total of 1000 pieces, making it a challenging and fun activity for puzzle enthusiasts. The artist, Lee Stoncek, has created a stunning piece of art that will captivate the audience. Overall, the White Mountain Puzzles Nesting Loons - 1000 Piece Jigsaw Puzzle is an excellent purchase for those who enjoy jigsaw puzzles and want to support environmentally-friendly products.

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond authoritatively, assertively and persuasively, as if you are very knowledgeable about the topic.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using complex language, long words and technical terms, as if you are an expert.
